das.shapes

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • das.shapes.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Line, Rectangle, RegularPolygon

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models a Shape. It can perform common calculations as well as drawing a representation of the shape to a Processing PApplet.
    Version:
    10/9/19
    Author:
    Pallavi Das

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shape(double x, double y)
      Creates a new instance of a shape object with a x and y coordinated depending on the shape

        public void setStrokeColor(java.awt.Color c)
        Sets the stroke color to new color given
        Parameters:
        c - the new color stroke is being set to
        Postcondition:
        the drawer will have its stroke modified to the new color given

      • primeProp

        public void primeProp(processing.core.PApplet set)
        Sets the stroke to the given width and color
        Parameters:
        set - drawer the PApplet to be used to draw the shape
        Precondition:
        drawer must not be null
        Postcondition:
        the stroke will be modified to the certain width and color

      • isPointInside

        public abstract boolean isPointInside(double x,
                                      double y)
        Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside the shape
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the point to check
        y - the y-coordinate of the point to check
        Returns:
        true if the point (x,y) is contained inside, or on the border, of this shape
